title: Can Eagles upset Buccaneers? How can Steelers defeat Chiefs? Likely road team to advance? Pat Freiermuth; Fantasy Awards
itunes:title: Can Eagles upset Buccaneers? How can Steelers defeat Chiefs? Likely road team to advance? Pat Freiermuth; Fantasy Awards
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and former NFL running back Maurice Jones-Drew open up exploring if the Philadelphia Eagles have a legitimate chance of upsetting the Super Bowl champion Tampa Bay Buccaneers on the road. Then they share their thoughts on which road team has the best chance for an upset win and how the Pittsburgh Steelers can take down the Kansas City Chiefs. They're joined by Pittsburgh Steelers tight end Pat Freirmuth for his thoughts on the Steelers season and the game between the Chargers and Raiders which controlled their playoff destiny. They finish up with fantasy awards for the season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
